name: Ostium (Dark Deer Games)
description:
You are witnessing the last transmission of the Expedition Division of Her Majesty's Fleet. The team was tasked with finding an ancient artefact on the ocean planet of Ostium, a remnant left behind in the War of Fallen Angels.

If found, this artefact would have spurred forward our weapons research, and brought our glorious Empire to new heights. The team was highly trained, loyal to  the core, and willing to put their lives on the line for the mission. Not one person among them would think twice about sacrificing their lives for the cause.

Deployed to the subsurface, the crew knew what their mission was, and proceeded with the utmost caution.

There were no survivors.

**********************************************

This is our submission for the October 2021 Scream Jam. We hope you like it! Thank you so much for supporting us, please consider following us on Twitter at DarkDeerGames, for semi-regular updates.

Design - Vincent O'Reilly

Programming - Conor Higgins

Submarine Design - Keith Thompson
